text: USP Leste is a train station belonging to CPTM Line 12-Sapphire, located in the city of São Paulo. ==History== USP Leste station was construct to attend the new campus of University of São Paulo, located north to the station, in the district of Cangaíba, East Side of São Paulo. ==References== Category:CPTM stations Category:Railway stations opened in 2009
title: USP Leste (CPTM)
